import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', }) export class HomeComponent { public uploadSaveUrl: string = "/api/FileUpload/SaveFile"; public userPic: string; successEventHandler(e) { this.userPic = e.response.json } }
